summary: This bill, the Truth and Healing Commission on Indian Boarding School Policies Act of 2025, establishes a commission to investigate the history and lasting impacts of Indian Boarding School Policies on Native American communities. The commission will conduct research, hold convenings, and make recommendations to Congress, including those related to burial sites, memorialization, and education. It also establishes advisory committees and subcommittees to provide input and support the commission's work, with a focus on survivor voices and the involvement of relevant stakeholders.
